original_text: I will give Egypt to him to pay him for his work. When his army attacked Tyre, they did that work for me. That is what the Almighty Lord says.
korean_text: 그들의 수고는 나를 위하여 함인즉 그 대가로 내가 애굽 땅을 그에게 주었느니라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will give Egypt to him
to pay him for his work
they did that work for me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나를 위해 그 일을 했다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Almighty Lord says
